name: Get to da Chopaaa!
description:
Get to da Chopaaa! is a party game for 2 to 4 players.

Each player will drive a combat helicopter and face their opponents when they die, they will have a second chance to continue on the battlefield. But this time in the form of an anti-aircraft tank. Having less life and mobility ... but a second chance is a second chance ...

This game is in an early stage of development, due to the current situation of quarantine and social distancing in this year 2020. This game was born as an alternative to play together with our brothers and sisters during this very special time.

Developing a game is not easy, therefore this project will only advance in our free time.

But if we see that there is an interest in the game ... well, we can use it as a real project.

Some plans we have for the future are ...

- Add power ups!

- Add bots

- Add cooperative and single player challenges

- Add a cooperative survival mode and single player

- Other things!
